int.name: nodes
int.description: All nodes (0D) belonging to the associated spaces, implicit declaration (no need to replicate the grid elements in the grid_subset structure). In case of a structured grid represented with multiple 1D spaces, the order of the implicit elements in the grid_subset follows Fortran ordering, i.e. iterate always on nodes of the first space first, then move to the second node of the second space, ... : [((s1_1 to s1_end), s2_1, s3_1 ... sN_1), (((s1_1 to s1_end), s2_2, s3_1, ... sN_1)), ... ((s1_1 to s1_end), s2_end, s3_end ... sN_end)]

int.name: nodes_combining_spaces
int.description: All nodes (0D) belonging to the first space, implicitly extended in other dimensions represented by the other spaces in a structured way. The number of subset elements is thus equal to the number of nodes in the first space. Implicit declaration (no need to replicate the grid elements in the grid_subset structure).

int.name: edges
int.description: All edges (1D) belonging to the associated spaces, implicit declaration (no need to replicate the grid elements in the grid_subset structure)

int.name: x_aligned_edges
int.description: All x-aligned (poloidally) aligned edges belonging to the associated spaces

int.name: y_aligned_edges
int.description: All y-aligned (radially) aligned edges belonging to the associated spaces

int.name: cells
int.description: All cells (2D) belonging to the associated spaces, implicit declaration (no need to replicate the grid elements in the grid_subset structure)

int.name: x_points
int.description: Nodes defining x-points

int.name: core_cut
int.description: y-aligned edges inside the separatrix connecting to the active x-point

int.name: PFR_cut
int.description: y-aligned edges in the private flux region connecting to the active x-point

int.name: outer_throat
int.description: y-aligned edges in the outer SOL connecting to the active x-point

int.name: inner_throat
int.description: y-aligned edges in the inner SOL connecting to the active x-point

int.name: outer_midplane
int.description: y-aligned edges connecting to the node closest to outer midplane on the separatrix

int.name: inner_midplane
int.description: y-aligned edges connecting to the node closest to inner midplane on the separatrix

int.name: outer_target
int.description: y-aligned edges defining the outer target

int.name: inner_target
int.description: y-aligned edges defining the inner target

int.name: core_boundary
int.description: Innermost x-aligned edges

int.name: separatrix
int.description: x-aligned edges defining the active separatrix

int.name: main_chamber_wall
int.description: x-aligned edges defining main chamber wall outside of the divertor regions

int.name: outer_baffle
int.description: x-aligned edges defining the chamber wall of the outer active divertor region

int.name: inner_baffle
int.description: x-aligned edges defining the chamber wall of the inner active divertor region

int.name: outer_PFR_wall
int.description: x-aligned edges defining the private flux region wall of the outer active divertor region

int.name: inner_PFR_wall
int.description: x-aligned edges defining the private flux region wall of the inner active divertor region

int.name: core
int.description: Cells inside the active separatrix

int.name: sol
int.description: Cells defining the main SOL outside of the divertor regions

int.name: outer_divertor
int.description: Cells defining the outer divertor region

int.name: inner_divertor
int.description: Cells defining the inner divertor region

int.name: core_sol
int.description: x-aligned edges defining part of active separatrix separating core and sol

int.name: full_main_chamber_wall
int.description: main_chamber_wall + outer_baffle(s) + inner_baffle(s)

int.name: full_PFR_wall
int.description: outer_PFR__wall(s) + inner_PFR_wall(s)

int.name: core_cut_X2
int.description: y-aligned edges inside the separatrix connecting to the non-active x-point

int.name: PFR_cut_X2
int.description: y-aligned edges in the private flux region connecting to the non-active x-point

int.name: outer_throat_X2
int.description: y-aligned edges in the outer SOL connecting to the non-active x-point

int.name: inner_throat_X2
int.description: y-aligned edges in the inner SOL connecting to the non-active x-point

int.name: separatrix_2
int.description: x-aligned edges defining the non-active separatrix

int.name: outer_baffle_2
int.description: x-aligned edges defining the chamber wall of the outer non-active divertor region

int.name: inner_baffle_2
int.description: x-aligned edges defining the chamber wall of the inner non-active divertor region

int.name: outer_PFR_wall_2
int.description: x-aligned edges defining the private flux region wall of the outer non-active divertor region

int.name: inner_PFR_wall_2
int.description: x-aligned edges defining the private flux region wall of the inner non-active divertor region

int.name: intra_sep
int.description: Cells between the two separatrices

int.name: outer_divertor_2
int.description: Cells defining the outer inactive divertor region

int.name: inner_divertor_2
int.description: Cells defining the inner inactive divertor region

int.name: outer_target_2
int.description: y-aligned edges defining the outer inactive target

int.name: inner_target_2
int.description: y-aligned edges defining the inner inactive target

int.name: volumes
int.description: All volumes (3D) belonging to the associated spaces, implicit declaration (no need to replicate the grid elements in the grid_subset structure)

int.name: full_wall
int.description: All edges defining walls, baffles, and targets

int.name: outer_sf_leg_entrance_1
int.description: y-aligned edges defining the SOL entrance of the first snowflake outer leg

int.name: outer_sf_leg_entrance_2
int.description: y-aligned edges defining the SOL entrance of the third snowflake outer leg

int.name: outer_sf_pfr_connection_1
int.description: y-aligned edges definingÂ the connection between the outer snowflake entrance and third leg

int.name: outer_sf_pfr_connection_2
int.description: y-aligned edges defining the connection between the outer snowflake first and second leg

int.name: magnetic_axis
int.description: Point corresponding to the magnetic axis

int.name: outer_mid_plane_separatrix
int.description: Point on active separatrix at outer mid-plane

int.name: inner_mid_plane_separatrix
int.description: Point on active separatrix at inner mid-plane

int.name: outer_target_separatrix
int.description: Point on active separatrix at outer active target

int.name: inner_target_separatrix
int.description: Point on active separatrix at inner active target

int.name: outer_target_separatrix_2
int.description: Point on non-active separatrix at outer non-active target

int.name: inner_target_separatrix_2
int.description: Point on non-active separatrix at inner non-active target
